name: RJ
wishText: May your special day be as lovely and amazing as you! - Mwolu ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: Appo njan vijarichu, I should do something
outroText: Okee, inee ith ishtaayo illayo ennu vannu para .
replayText: Allenkil onnoode kaananamenkil ivde click cheyy.
